tagline: Protocols and Legislation for Black Market Pudding
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Black Market Pudding
body:
### Black Market Pudding.

Black Market Pudding is an unusual recipe, which uses blood taken from a living pig to produce a delicious sausage dish.

```
$ cd John0/BlackMarketPudding
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors
In 2012, John O'Shea (@John0) began this repository of protocols and legislation.

### More Information
Sign up to the mailing list at http://www.blackmarketpudding.co.uk or contact contact@blackmarketpudding.co.uk
